Text: Why is it this french shit every single time - we need some english instead!

To H_A_N_S_E_N :

1 - You could be polite, can't you?

(by the way it is written "French" in the title, so you know that's a french version and that you don't need it)

3 - The philosophy behind peer to peer is to share and provide digital content to everyone. From this point of view, that's a good thing to have torrents available in many different languages.
